meta.title: O Churrasquinho À Guia | Authentic Piri-Piri Chicken in Carnaxide since 1999
meta.description: Traditional Portuguese restaurant in Carnaxide, Lisbon. Specialists in charcoal-grilled Piri-Piri Chicken for over 25 years. Honest prices, authentic flavour. Book now!

hero.title: Algarve Tradition in Carnaxide since 1999
hero.subtitle: The authentic charcoal-grilled Piri-Piri Chicken. A flavour that has won hearts for over 25 years.

about.title: 25 Years Grilling Tradition
about.text1: Since 1999 in Carnaxide, we have brought the Algarve tradition of authentic Piri-Piri Chicken to Greater Lisbon. For over 25 years, we have maintained the original recipe and charcoal-grilling method that has won over generations of customers.
about.text2: What started as a small family restaurant has become a reference point for those seeking genuine flavours of Portuguese cuisine at honest prices. Our secret? Charcoal, time and passion for what we do.

specialties.title: Our Specialties
specialties.frangoGuiaDesc: Our star dish. Chicken marinated with the traditional Algarve recipe, slowly grilled over charcoal. Served with spicy piri-piri sauce, chips and salad.
specialties.note: All our dishes are made with love for tradition to ensure authentic flavour.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.testimonial1: The best piri-piri chicken in the area. Incredibly affordable for what you get. For two portions of piri-piri chicken, 2 beers, 1 Coca-Cola, bread and 2 coffees, I paid €27. Simply outstanding value for today's prices. Charcoal-grilled, full of flavour, perfect piri-piri sauce, fast and efficient service, quiet area with outdoor terrace.
testimonials.testimonial2: Super tasty piri-piri chicken. The service is fast, efficient and very friendly. Great value for money.
testimonials.testimonial3: Everything was very good. 5-star service. Great prices.
testimonials.testimonial4: Part of the gastronomic itinerary. Great chicken, friendly service and relaxed atmosphere.
testimonials.testimonial5: A restaurant with great customer demand, operating in two shifts with excellent attendance, the menu is varied and well served, great prices, an excellent air-conditioned dining room and a nice outdoor seating area.
